  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Retrieves and populates table view by retrieving database information. Lambda expression - prevents users form picking past dates.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resourceBundle -

    • submitAppointmentClicked

      public void submitAppointmentClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Parses the user input, converts date and times to LocalDateTime objects, and conducts validation checking on inputted information. Uses a sequence of If else statements, and calls the checkAppointmentOverlap() method and checkIfESTHours() method. If all checks are passed the method calls the DBAppointment.addAppointment() method to create an entry.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • upDateClicked

      public void upDateClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Parses the user input, converts date and times to LocalDateTime objects, and conducts validation checking on inputted information. Uses a sequence of If else statements, and calls the checkAppointmentOverlap() method and checkIfESTHours() method. If all checks pass the DBAppointment.updateAppointment() method is called to modify entry.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • updateAppointment

      public void updateAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Populates the text-fields, combo-boxes and date picker with selected appointment from the AppointmentTableView.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • deleteCustomer

      public void deleteCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Deletes selected appointment from the database. If selection is not null, the appointment ID is parsed and converted to an int. After validation and confirmation the int is passed as an argument to the DBAppointment.deleteAppointment() method. The table view items are set to show updated results.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • toMaineMenu
